abstract: Editorial lauds Pres Obama for executive actions aimed at limiting criminals' access to guns; notes expansion of dealer licensing and streamlining of background checks, despite condemnation from Republican presidential candidates, merely enforces existing laws and echoes demands of gun-rights activists; calls on Congress to pass further protections, which overwhelming majority of Americans endorse.
lead_paragraph: Congressional Republicans won’t pass even basic, sensible gun-safety measures, so Mr. Obama is doing what he can through executive actions.

headline.main: The President Acts on Gun Violence
headline.print_headline: The President Acts on Gun Violence

snippet: Congressional Republicans won’t pass even basic, sensible gun-safety measures, so Mr. Obama is doing what he can through executive actions.
